main event: A UFO sighting was observed over Montevideo, Uruguay, with multiple witnesses reporting a luminous object hovering over the city at different times.
interesting points: The object was described as an unusually bright ball of fire followed by a smoke trail, and it was seen by many people.
Newspaper articles reported that the object passed over the city several times, and aircraft were reported in the area, possibly jets.
Witnesses reported seeing an enormous silver disc that remained motionless over the city, emitting intense light and rays of blue luminosity.
The object was reported to have a discoidal, flat shape with rounded edges and emitted a clear, bluish light resembling a flame.

At a different sighting in Montevideo, witnesses observed multiple objects with a rotating movement, estimated to be approximately two meters in diameter, and exhibiting dense, bright characteristics.
sighted object: luminous object and an enormous silver disc
witnesses: multiple witnesses from different locations in the city
